Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of at least two lines of red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394215) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394215)
